description:
The first charter school opened in 1992 in Minnesota and now nearly 4,600 can be found across the nation. Learn the in's and out's of charter schools with this downloadable course teaching you EVERYTHING you need to know about starting and opening your own charter school. Avoid common mistakes and get answers to frequently asked questions. This course is additionally helpful for future private school and/or daycare owners.

This course will teach you:

-how to turn your idea into reality

-strategies to fund your school

-places to turn for support

-how to build your board

-step by step documents to share with your team

and much more!

This course is a comprehensive starter to get future school founders on their way to developing their new venture. Very often Education Entrepreneurs and Future School Leaders do not know where to turn for help; this course was designed for you!

We will see you in class!
title: How To Open A School: An All Inclusive Course
